subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn was disqualified for running off the course in La Molina, Spain, and Tanja Poutiainen of Finland won the giant slalom, overtaking Vonn in the overall World Cup standings. Julia Mancuso finished 18th in the first women’s World Cup event held in the Spanish Pyrenees. ¶Carlo Janka of Switzerland won a World Cup giant slalom race in Val d’Isère, France. Among Americans, Ted Ligety finished 12th and Bode Miller was 24th after nearly falling. slalom.
